title: Worker quits to seek new job, frictional unemplmt

content.question: Which of the following is an example of frictional unemployment?

choices.label: A person quits a job to search for another job.
A person lacks the skills to fill any of the available jobs.
A person loses a job because of a recession.
A person retires from the workforce.
An unemployed person stops looking for a job.

content.answer: A person quits a job to search for another job.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
